text: The 1999 All Thailand Golf Tour was the first season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 1999 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! title: 1999 All Thailand Golf Tour
